property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose an opponent. You and that player each draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: During [Military] challenges, Robb Stark gets +1 STR for each loyal character you control. Action: While Robb Stark is participating in a [Military] challenge, choose a participating non-King character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to a House Tully character, kneel Riverrun to have that character gain 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: During [Power] challenges, Ser Colen of Greenpools gets +3 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Summer plot card is revealed, kneel Bitterbridge Encampment. Then, each player may put a character into play from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control Arya Stark, sacrifice Arry. Action: Return Arry to your hand to draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent collects income, kneel White Tree to move 1 gold from that player’s gold pool to your own.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After you lose a [Power] challenge, sacrifice White Raven. Reaction: After you win dominance, if there is a Summer or Winter plot card revealed, gain 1 power for your faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: R’hllor character only. Reaction: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge in which attached character is attacking, name a card. The losing opponent reveals his or her hand and discards each card with that name.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 gold to give Janos Slynt +2 STR until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a player initiates a challenge against you, move up to X gold from that player’s gold pool to your own. X is the number of attacking characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a non-loyal character enters play, kneel your faction card and sacrifice Captain’s Daughter to place that character on top of its owner’s deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Pyke to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Viserys Targaryen is attacking, each King character must be declared as a defender, if able. Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, if no opponent controls a King character, Viserys Targaryen gains 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a [Power] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to choose and stand a participating character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Sand Snake character in your hand gains ambush (X). X is 1 less than that card’s printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an event is played, gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance Action: Kneel Pyromancers and discard 1 power from your faction card to choose a non-limited location, and discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters and locations do not provide positive gold modifiers.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Initiate the when revealed ability on a revealed non-Riddle plot card as if you had just revealed it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost of the first loyal card you marshal or play each round by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When the effects of an ability that chooses a [Stark] character as its only target would initiate, cancel those effects and stand that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are more Summer plot cards than Winter plot cards revealed, Knight of Summer gets +2 STR and gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a challenge. Challenges Action: Reveal 4 [Tyrell] characters from your hand to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During an [Intrigue] challenge in which you are the defending player, kneel your faction card to put Dolorous Edd into play from your hand knelt, participaing as a defender. If you win the challenge, you may return him to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there is a Kingdom plot card revealed, increase the gold value on your revealed plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold to stand Shae. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Lord character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Reaction: After a character with printed cost 3 or lower is killed, kneel The Boy King to have attached character gain 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Balon Greyjoy does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [Military] challenge against an opponent who does not control a King character. Action: Kneel a [Greyjoy] location to give each loyal character you control +1 STR until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Until the end of the phase, either: each [Greyjoy] character you control gains stealth, or each non-[Greyjoy] character loses stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: During a challenge in which you control a participating Lord or Lady character, Doreah gains insight.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Targaryen] character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Reaction: After an opponent reveals a plot card with a higher printed gold value than yours, kneel Beggar King to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if no opponent controls a King character.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Starfall Cavalry enters play, draw 1 card. (3 cards instead if there are 3 or more plot cards in your used pile.)

property.name: Text
property.value: [Martell] character you control only. Attached character gets +1 STR. Reaction: After Venomous Blade enters play, place a poison token on a character with printed STR 2 or lower. At the end of the phase, if that character still has that poison token, remove it and kill that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot include Winter plot cards in your plot deck. Increase the reserve value on each player’s revealed plot card by 1. While there are no Winter plot cards revealed, increase the gold value on your revealed Summer plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot include Summer plot cards in your plot deck. Reduce the reserve value on each player’s revealed plot card by 1. While you have a Winter plot card revealed, reduce the gold value on each opponent’s non-Summer plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. X is 2 higher than the printed gold value on that opponent’s revealed plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if there are no Summer plot cards revealed, gain 2 power for your faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a character gains power, move 1 power from that character to a House Tully character. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal a loyal card, gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent controls a King character, Renly Baratheon cannot be saved. Reaction: After you draw a loyal card using insight, reveal it to draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lord character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give attached character +X STR until the end of the phase. X is the number of challenge icons attached character has. (Limit twice per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, gain 1 power for your faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Choose an opponent whose reserve value is lower than yours. Until the end of the phase, you may marshal characters from that player’s discard pile as if they were in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal Asshai Priestess, choose and kneel a character with STR 2 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponent's character only. Attached character gets -1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent controls 3 or fewer characters, Ser Amory Lorch gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Kneel Harrenhal to put a [Lannister] or House Bolton character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal Lordsport Fisherman, add the bottom card of your deck to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ironborn character only. Attached character gains the King trait and pillage. Reaction: After an attachment or location is discarded using pillage, attached character gains 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Bloodrider character you control gets +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Search your deck for a Bloodrider character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Spearmaiden is declared as an attacker in a [Military] challenge, choose a character controlled by the defending player. If you win the challenge by 5 or more STR, that character must be chosen for claim during this challenge, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, choose up to X [Martell] characters. Each of those characters gains renown until the end of the phase. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel a Companion character to reduce the cost of the next unique character you marshal this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: The God’s Eye cannot be discarded from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Choose an Ally character, and discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character with printed cost 4 or higher cannot be declared as a defender during the first challenge you initiate this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Jojen Reed stands, reveal the top card of each player's deck. You may either: discard each of those cards, or have each player draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Stark] character only. Attached character gains the King trait and does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a military challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there is a Summer plot card revealed, King Renly's Host gets +4 STR. While there is a Winter plot card revealed, King Renly's Host cannot be declared as an attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you reveal a plot card, choose a player. Look at the top 2 cards of that player's deck. Place 1 of those cards on the bottom of that deck, and the other on top.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control 3 or more [Night's Watch] locations and/or attachments, Shadow Tower Mason gains a [Military] and a [Intrigue] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Haunted Forest is standing, it contributes 1 STR to your side during any challenge in which you are the defending player. Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge, kneel The Haunted Forest.

property.name: Text
property.value: During [Power] challenges, each participating non-King character gets -1 STR. Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a non-loyal character. That character cannot stand during the standing phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the R'hllor trait and gets +1 STR for each R'hllor character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal Tanda Stokeworth, each player gains 3 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win an [Intrigue] challenge, discard up to 3 cards at random from the losing opponent's hand. Then, that player draws 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a character is saved, either: stand it, or kneel it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win initiative, gain 1 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Pyat Pree is participating, search the top X cards of your deck for a [Targaryen] attachment or event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. X is the STR by which you won the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a character with 1 or more power is killed, kneel Vaes Tolorro to move 1 power from that character to Vaes Tolorro. (Up to 2 power instead if that character's STR is 0.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose an unopposed challenge, set the claim value on the winning opponent's revealed plot card to 0 until the end of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Jaqen H'ghar enters play, place a Valar Morghulis token on up to 3 different unique characters. If Jaqen H'ghar leaves play, discard those tokens from play. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Jaqen H'ghar is attacking alone, choose and kill a character with a Valar Morghulis token.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Isle of Ravens to choose a card in any player's discard pile, and shuffle it into its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wildling character only. Attached character gains the King trait. While attached character is attacking a player with a higher power total than you, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Roose Bolton is attacking, choose up to X total STR worth of characters controlled by the losing opponent. X is Roose Bolton's STR. Sacrifice Roose Bolton to kill each of those characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a character enters play, kneel your faction card and sacrifice Harrenhal to kill it.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a King character or Catelyn Stark, Brienne of Tarth does not kneel when declared as a defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control Renly Baratheon or a Lady character. Challenges Action: Choose an attacking character, stand it and remove it from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to effects of Omen cards. Action: Sacrifice Craster to put each character that was killed during this phase into play from its owner's dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: [thenightswatch] character only. While attached character is participating in a challenge, it gets +2 STR and is immune to opponent's character abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Ser Davos Seaworth bypasses a non-loyal character using stealth, either: draw 1 card, or gain 1 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose X standing R'hllor characters. Each of those characters gains 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal a loyal character, kneel that character and your faction card to choose and kill a non-King character with a lower printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel a character with an [intrigue] icon to gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a [power] challenge. Action: Choose a participating Drowned God or Ironborn character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +3 STR. If you win the challenge, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you marshal a unique attachment, gain 2 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Stormborn character you control only. Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating Dragon character, kneel Mother of Dragons to have attached character participate in that challenge on your side.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are no King characters in play, Myrcella Baratheon gains renown and does not kneel when declared as a defender in a [power] challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel The Prince's Pass to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. Then, if that character has no challenge icons, you may sacrifice The Prince's Pass to discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Silent Sisters gets +1 STR for each character in your dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After The Frostfangs enters play, give control of it to an opponent. -1 Reserve.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a unique character with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Put the top character in each player's dead pile into play.
